entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:01 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then southwest 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
